sentences: Gianluca Sambucini discussed a ten-country study comparing national policies on energy and CO2 emissions.
He highlighted the cooperation between ECE member States and Central and Eastern European States.
IEA: Executive-Director Robert Priddle said that the IEA ministers have adopted a new statement on energy goals that features environmental considerations.
The adoption of policies for tackling energy intensive consumption, improving end-use energy efficiency, technology collaboration, and joint implementation is crucial.
enb_long_title: First Conference of the Parties to the Framework Convention on Climate Change
